name: market for sodium nitrate, unrefined | sodium nitrate, unrefined | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/29321/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This activity represents the market for 1 kg of sodium nitrate, unrefined. Unrefined sodium nitrate has a purity of 45%-60%. The major natural resources of this product are found in caliche ore in Chile.;Sodium nitrate with this purity is usually not sold on the market. This sodium nitrate is used in the production of potassium nitrate or will be further processed to higher purities. 

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'sodium nitrate, unrefined', within the geography of Chile.

This activity ends with the supply of sodium nitrate, unrefined', to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The dataset is assumed to be at least valid since the publication of the study used for the transport estimation (2017), until the year of assessment (2023).
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is valid within the geography of Chile.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Transport assumptions were extrapolated from "sodium nitrate production, unrefined from caliche ore mining - CL".
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Transport assumptions have been extrapolated from the activity "sodium nitrate production, unrefined from caliche ore mining, CL". The road transport has been extrapolated. The train distance has been calculated from the distances to Coya Sur to the main mining facilities [https://www.sqm.com/sqmeninfografias/eng/presence.html] [Ordóñez, J. et al. (2017) “Heap Leaching of Caliche Ore. Modeling of a Multicomponent System with Particle Size Distribution” https://doi.org/10.3390/min7100180].

exchanges.description: Sodium nitrate reaching a purity of about 50%. This sodium nitrate is used in the production of potassium nitrate or will be further processed to higher purities. So, this product is not sold on the market.

flow.name: sodium nitrate, unrefined
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

exchanges.description:
Estimated value. Weighted average distance to Coya Sur (where the product is further processed)  from two mining location, by production volume: Pampa Blanca 375,000 t and 90 km and Nueva Victoria 1,000,000 t and 185 km. Train transport was considered as main transport based on "sodium nitrate production, unrefined from caliche ore mining, CL". Volumes taken from 
Ordóñez, J. et al. (2017) “Heap Leaching of Caliche Ore. Modeling of a Multicomponent System with Particle Size Distribution” https://doi.org/10.3390/min7100180.
